scripts.runtime:prepare: npm run annotate --prefix ../../incremental/runtime && npm run build --prefix ../../incremental
scripts.demo:run:light: npm run compile --prefix demo && npm run run --prefix demo
scripts.demo:run: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run demo:run:light
scripts.compile:deps:harness: cd ../../incremental/harness && npm run compile && npm run build
scripts.compile:deps: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run compile:deps:harness && npm run runtime:prepare
scripts.test: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run test:rewrite:other
scripts.test:all: npm run compile && npm run test:rewrite && npm run test:diagnostics && npm run test:executable
